Reviews.Title: “Satisfaction”
Reviews.Author: Hilary W
Reviews.Content: reading adverse reviews hotel bit worried booked found suitable central wellappointed ensuite bathrooms lovely jacuzzistyle baths beds comfortable maid service daily heat nextdoor restaurants kitchen temperature hot couldnt leave windows mosquitoes eat alive bitten anyway receptionists airconditioning broken told switched april electric fan obligingly provided helped considerably continental breakfast adequate service excellent staff friendly obliging heat complaints whatsoever

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: AntonioMayo
Reviews.Content: location value solo traveller helpful staff easy access marco vaporetti shops etc chose hotel basis cost list supplied airline booked read mixed reviews tripadvisor prepared mind stay hope future stayed nine nights march beginning april easy nature venetian streets coop supermarket five minutes hotel dont wrong helpful friendly staff main breakfast housekeeping staff friendly efforts fix tv single clean appointed own ensuite location convenient rest day exploring islands heading enjoy venice night stay hope future

Reviews.Title: “Good value for such a central location”
Reviews.Author: Peter M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: spent nights hotel provided facilities required sufficiently comfortable clean quiet easy hardly hotels fault venice particular labyrinth narrow alleyways venetian postal addresses incomprehensible breakfast write home fairly typical italy

Reviews.Title: “Not that bad!”
Reviews.Author: Callaghans
Reviews.Content: husband travelling round europe month dreading staying reviews honestly bad tricky reception desk friendly helpful advice restaurants paid little bit extra own private bathroom perfectly suitable price location extremely hot due pipes running underneath floor apart absolutely fine venice venice bit boring left city

Reviews.Title: “Budget accomodation in Heart of Venice”
Reviews.Author: viraam
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location near st marks square printout map hotel website easy reach hotel couple please queen bed otherwise twin bed changed request day location hotel budget accomodation fine toilet bathroom floor ventilation proper mention venice costly budget accomodation costly venice disliked thi hotel rudeness breakfast staff staff friendly breakfast person crossiant bread toast breakfast cornflakes juice unlimited

Reviews.Title: “Beware: BEDBUGS !”
Reviews.Author: histonham
Reviews.Content: adequate dirty crawling bedbugs sadly didnt realize leaving venice spent night bites mosquito bites soon realized wasnt friend covered bites bodies huge infestation addition found front desk unhelpful restaurant recommendations directions else warned

Reviews.Title: “Great Location with an Acceptable Level of Facilities”
Reviews.Author: Gade_Siraprapa
Reviews.Content: 20 days plan 5days trip venice prior departure affordable beautiful hotels san macro booked friday saturday nights reading reviews internet finally decided book hotel expectations stay lowest price san macro stay weekend stay hotels desired weekdays available hotel beyond expectations hotel location close san macro convenient eg sun rise morning piazza walk late night eat hotel short break using toilet resting legs feel walk anymore day easily access rialto port macro port etc hotel perfect people limited budget stay san marco acceptable level facilities stay hotel normal 68 sleeping hours besides hotel staffs nice hotel location hard googles hotel location walk hotel own cons stayed door panel hits bed door wider 4060 degrees elevators tiny spaces luggage dont smallness hotel lot larger lot facilities lot cheaper prices else venice moreover meats vegetable eggs breakfast menu 95 hotel breakfast carb tea juice milk coffee ok usually eat breakfast anyway nice healthy breakfast suggest additional breakfast meal own

Reviews.Author: boysy
Reviews.Content: easy walk san marco square pass americano coffee shop ay ferrari shop cartier shop beyond piazza helpful friendly staff comfortable special payed extra bathroom found bonus breakfast norm rolls jams cereal clean towels bedding day center venice price bang try book week days saturday sundays noisy busy found refuge canareggio district st marks amazing soon staying cheaper hotel district luna easy water bus pass loved hope enjoy guy malta

Reviews.Title: “Superb location but not a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: RangoonMonsoon
Reviews.Content: simply looking relatively cheap lay head location worse hotel location pretty damn 2 minutes st marks square rialto bridge thick action basic perfectly comfortable dont expect service style fine lighting dingy rugs despite cold storage space feels slightly knackered didnt bother expecting romantic venetian palazzo disappointed

Reviews.Title: “great location and great value !!”
Reviews.Author: theamericandiner
Reviews.Content: stayed budget expect delighted location staff helpful clean bed comfortable sheets changed daily breakfast basic pleasant indeed 100 stay hotel promise delivers

Reviews.Title: “Not exciting, great location, nice staff, but more of a youth hostel”
Reviews.Author: andigger
Reviews.Content: id rate hotel slightly below average smashed mosquitos wall staff friendly finding hotel bit hard directions trouble mosquitos cleaned walls makes rate lower breakfast fine exciting reminds youth hostel thankfully late night noice wouldnt recommend hotel friend friend reservation found wouldnt encourage change locations prepared

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: BrisbaneTraveller2
Reviews.Content: booked night 24 august 2010 budget hotel near st marks square difficult dismayed air conditioning 32 degrees flights stairs lift requested air conditioning told none sitting wondering reception phoned prepared pay extra 30 euros move hotel walked hotel nearby superior air conditioning moved straight paid extra money cash hotel hotels owned company

Reviews.Title: “think before you book”
Reviews.Author: parker69
Reviews.Content: trying rate hotel founding hard 1 star hostel painted yellow hint crushed wall ceiling sink fan blow hot air round plus staff helpful 2 min walk square ps lots spending money

Reviews.Title: “Please consider this review before finalizing your stay.”
Reviews.Author: Elanou
Reviews.Content: consider avid traveler looks moderately priced accommodations definitely stayed dirty world issue hotel value money expensive hotel trip worst experience ive convinced stay close san marco reality venice staying little save money dreaded 27 read reviews didnt seriously honestly furnace windows feel 5 degrees cooler wouldnt carry 3 nights stayed slept total 10 hours serious renovations piece advice please please twice staying

Reviews.Title: “There are mosquitos squished on all the walls”
Reviews.Author: shellyse
Reviews.Content: worst hotel seen life 29 fan air conditioning air circulation window onto wall 2 feet floors heated oven leave window mosquitoes dont window bake night luckily changed day fan bathrooms filthy walls hallways covered marks people killing bugs girl night clerk didnt catch name boyfriend flirting time key left hotel refused hotel locked clerk goes upstairs sleep midnight 2 stars stretch

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly located little Gem of a Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Jabu55
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights easter weekend 2010 little hotel friends lovely weekend hotel hundred metres piazza san marco commented bit difficult front door head inland bell tower cartier jewellery shop head alley square restaurant ahead hotel restaurant front door alley restaurant hang sharp left walkway building restaurant front door hotel corner left exit underpass clean run little hotel friendly helpful staff fairly basic adequate nicely decorated ours 2nd floor shower comfortable double bed tv fan light dimmer comments noise mosquitos heres lively vibrant city lots water expect noise chatter people enjoying themselves restaurant 11pm odd mosquito repellant thats restaurant below excellent friendly efficient service meal drinks averaged 80 paid home highly recommended venice choice hotel
